channel.title: Steven Spielberg on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Steven Spielberg on jverkamp.com

item.title: Ready Player One
item.description:
Oh hey, that’s a DeLorean! I should go re-watch Back to the Future.

Ready Player One is a very pretty movie (I seem to be saying that [a lot]) recently) and absolutely chock full of pop culture references… which honestly felt rather overdone. The plot is thin and the world doesn’t really make sense, although I did enjoy the characters well enough.

item.title: Jurassic Park (3D!)
item.description: I wasn’t actually sure if I wanted to add this to my 2013 Movie Rankings, since really this isn’t a new movie for 2013. But in the end, it is a movie and I did see it, so it seems worthwhile to post about. ðŸ˜„
